snippet: General Motors says that its target buyer for the 130R wants rear-wheel drive and four seats -- and presumably, an interior.
abstract: General Motors says that its target buyer for the 130R wants rear-wheel drive and four seats -- and presumably, an interior.
lead_paragraph: Introduced on Monday, Jan. 9: Chevrolet Code 130R concept.

headline.main: Chevy Code 130R: A Muscle-Car Concept for the Millennial Set
